author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- PR Times to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
March 2(Reuters) - PR Times Inc
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 160,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between March 19 and March 26
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 100 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/Zd94Pe
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
